meta.project: RaiseCapital Plataforma de Captação de Recursos

product_overview: RaiseCapital is a comprehensive digital platform designed to facilitate capital raising by connecting growth-stage companies with qualified investors. It features advanced analytics, interactive dashboards, a robust CRM, secure data room, and compliance automation to create an efficient and transparent investment ecosystem.
core_goals: Facilitate the capital raising process for growing companies
Connect qualified investors with relevant investment opportunities
Provide advanced tools for financial analysis and due diligence
Establish a transparent and efficient investment market ecosystem
key_features: Executive Dashboard with real-time pipeline tracking, KPIs, market analysis, and customizable reports
Intelligent Matchmaking system with advanced filters, compatibility scoring, and personalized recommendations
Virtual Data Room for secure document upload, granular access control, audit logs, and versioning
Integrated CRM for unified contact management, sales pipeline tracking, marketing automation, and multi-channel communication
Financial Analysis Tools including financial modeling, automatic valuation, risk scoring, and market benchmarking
Payment and Compliance System with multi-gateway support, automatic regulatory checks, KYC/AML verification, and smart contract generation
Complete Authentication System with email verification, password reset, and two-factor authentication
Blockchain wallet integration enabling Web3 functionalities such as balance checking and transaction history
Content Management for blogs, static pages, and educational materials
Responsive and mobile-first UI built with Next.js, React, Tailwind CSS, and comprehensive UI component libraries
RESTful API endpoints for key operations including offers, blogs, uploads, and wallet management
user_flow_summary: Company onboarding with guided multi-step registration, pitch deck creation, data room setup, investor search with filters, relationship management, and deal closure with digital signatures

Investor onboarding with KYC verification, profile setup, personalized opportunity discovery, due diligence via data room access, communication and negotiation tools, culminating in digital investment processes
Use of dashboards and reports for real-time performance tracking and decision making
Interaction with matchmaking tools to find compatible investment opportunities or investors
Engagement with content and educational resources to support informed investing and fund raising
validation_criteria: Successful user registration including authentication and verification flows
Accurate matching results reflecting filters and scoring in the matchmaking system
Secure and auditable document uploads with appropriate access controls implemented in the data room
Functioning CRM with contact management, pipeline visualization, and integrated communication channels
Reliable payment processing with transaction records and compliance checks
Responsive and accessible UI across devices with consistent performance
Robust API endpoints with expected request handling and data integrity
Compliance with security, privacy, and regulatory standards including LGPD and financial regulations
Performance metrics meeting targets for system uptime, load handling, and response times

features.name: Authentication System

features.name: Dashboard Interface
features.description: Interactive dashboard with sidebar navigation, charts, data tables, and responsive design

features.name: File Upload System
features.description: File upload functionality with image optimization, multiple formats support, and storage management
